My viewpoint1) in Malaysia: Finance ministry is the most important portfolio, placing another untrusted person would be able to dissolve ruling government if budget is not passed.    DS Najib majored in industrial economics: It would be wiser for him to place himself as the finance minister.    He has two boffin boys assisting him : Johari and Idris Jala: the economic policies implemented by them are set as an example for other countries to escape middle income trap by IMF.    We are expected to become a developed country by year 2020: No logical data by any international agencies and current economic growth trend would be able null the success of achieving high income nation in year 2020.2) Yes. agree with you: corruption involved mainly to siphon money for GE 13: He didn't have Mahathir backing who had billions and Mahathir prevented many of UMNO cronies not to donate money to Najib during GE13. 3) He has put highly intelligent people in his ETP and Pemandu : they are highly paid and they work with almost no bureaucracies : Huge amount of money is channeled for Malaysian development through his own Prime Minister's Department. Najib has failed to sack redundant ineffective high level government officers in other ministries.In Malaysian government, as long as you come to work: even if do not any work: people can't retrench you easily. Even those people who doesn't turn up for work: It takes almost 2 years for the government to fire them. This is an impossible task for any prime minister: Najib only limited new intakes.Najib is not perfect, but opposition would place Malaysia under the radar of socialism and collapse the economy. Please study Southern American socialist countries, especially Venezuela. Scandavanian countries would have been multiple times richer than USA if they didn't adopt socialist policies: make comparison 1950 and 2020.
